articles.title: Subscription forms links
articles.desc: You can now add a link in the subscription form to redirect to the privacy policy and terms of service pages instead of opening them in a popup.

articles.title: Direct unsubscribe link with redirection
articles.desc: We added the possibility to insert a direct unsubscribe link with a redirection option in your emails, that will unsubscribe the user from the campaign's lists with one click even if you have enabled the unsubscribe page.

articles.title: Detailed statistics export
articles.desc: A new option is available in the Data Collection tab to choose the separator to use in the CSV export files for statistics export.

articles.title: User export in automations
articles.desc: It is now possible to dynamically add the time to the exported files for the user export action in automations, to generate a file per time period.

articles.title: Internal improvements
articles.desc: The internal structure of the extension has been improved to increase security and stability.

articles.title: RTL support in notifications center
articles.desc: The notifications center now handles RTL languages and multiple notifications can be removed at once.

articles.title: Scenarios unsubscribe
articles.desc: We added the possibility to unsubscribe from a scenario's emails using the unsubscribe link.

articles.title: EventBooking time in emails
articles.desc: A new option lets you hide the time in event dates for EventBooking.

articles.title: Joomla 6 compatibility
articles.desc: Modifications have been made for a better compatibility with Joomla 6.

articles.title: ACL improvements
articles.desc: The Joomla ACL system was not applied for managers and administrators. You can now restrict access to AcyMailing without needing to change the AcyMailing advanced ACL.

articles.title: GDPR data export
articles.desc: The AcyMailing user data is now added to the WordPress user data export system.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Template duplication
articles.desc: When duplicating a template, its previous creator ID was copied. It now correctly takes the ID of the user that duplicated the template.

articles.title: Bounce address connection for POP3
articles.desc: The connection to the bounce address has been fixed for the POP3 protocol without IMAP in some cases.

articles.title: Multilingual welcome email
articles.desc: Saving an alternate version of a welcome email when the multilingual option is active doesn't replace the original version anymore.

articles.title: RSS feed authors
articles.desc: The authors are now correctly shown when inserting RSS feed items and its shortcode in custom views is now working properly.

articles.title: Default templates
articles.desc: We fixed the reinstallation of default templates which created empty templates.
